localised_action_description: Progressively [[col:green]]increases the experience[[/col]] of all units in parent army. (authority-based)
Brings word of glorious battles and great victories, thereby [[col:green]]inspiring the local populace[[/col]]. (authority-based)
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by appealing to their sense of reason.
Traps the target agent, reducing their [[col:green]]movement range[[/col]] and [[col:green]]making them vulnerable to agent actions[[/col]]. (cunning-based)
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting their fears and weaknesses.
[[col:green]]Reduces the morale and charge bonus[[/col]] of all units in the target army.
Causes [[col:green]]casualties[[/col]] within a single unit of an enemy army. (cunning-based)
[[col:green]]Reduces the morale[[/col]] of all units in the target army. (zeal-based)
Challenges the target character to a 'fair and honourable' [[col:green]]fight to the death[[/col]].
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character from afar before they have a chance to react.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character through swift and merciless brutality (zeal-based).
Wreaks [[col:green]]despair amongst the populace[[/col]] with small-scale military actions. (cunning-based)
[[col:green]]Intensifies servile disorder[[/col]] in the target settlement, leading to a slave revolt. Has a chance to cause an instant rebellion (authority-based).
Causes [[col:green]]casualties[[/col]] across the target settlement's garrison (cunning-based).
Causes [[col:green]]major damage[[/col]] to a single building in the target settlement. (zeal-based)
Acquires a [[col:green]]small amount of wealth[[/col]], increasing as the champion wanders further from friendly territory.
[[col:green]]Increases the authority[[/col]] of the parent army's general and [[col:green]]reduces upkeep costs[[/col]]. (authority-based)
Advises local officials, thereby [[col:green]]increasing tax rates[[/col]] while helping [[col:green]]protect local settlements against authoritarian agent actions[[/col]]. (cunning-based)
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]]. (authority-based)
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting to their greed and vanity.
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by exploiting their fears and weaknesses.
Attempt to bribe the commander of an army, either making them [[col:green]]join your faction[[/col]] or have them killed by their troops. (authority-based)
Attempt to bribe the general of an army, either making them join your faction or have them killed by their troops.
Attempt to [[col:green]]bribe a unit[[/col]] into disbanding from their army. Ineffective if there is only a general's bodyguard unit in the army. (zeal-based)
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by putting a bounty on their head.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] as a tribute to the gods, which raises the people's spirit and grants [[col:green]]public order[[/col]] in all provinces. (cunning-based)
Slander and degrade an enemy agent or general, reducing their [[col:green]]attributes[[/col]]. (zeal-based)
Corrupts local officials, forcing them to give you [[col:green]]gold[[/col]] from the taxes in the settlement. The settlement's records do not reflect this, of course. (cunning-based)
Increase the presence of [[col:green]]your faction's culture[[/col]] within the target settlement. (authority-based)
[[col:green]]Impedes commerce[[/col]] in the target settlement.
[[col:green]]Spreads unhappiness[[/col]] in the target settlement, potentially driving the population to revolt. (zeal-based)
Gradually [[col:green]]spreads your culture[[/col]] throughout the local province.\n[[col:yellow]]Ineffective where your culture is already dominant.[[/col]]
Increases the [[col:green]]movement range[[/col]] of the parent army. (cunning-based)

Establishes a local spy network, improving the [[col:green]]chance of detecting hidden agents and armies[[/col]] in the area whilst [[col:green]]protecting local settlements from agent actions[[/col]]. (authority-based)
Manipulates the target agent into [[col:green]]joining your cause[[/col]] by appealing to their sense of reason.
Robs the enemy agent blind, stealing [[col:green]]gold and an ancillary[[/col]], as well as reducing their [[col:green]]chance of success[[/col]]. (cunning-based)
Distracts an enemy agent from their mission, reducing [[col:green]]their movement[[/col]]. (zeal-based)
Burns arrows, rocks and other projectiles, reducing [[col:green]]the ammunition[[/col]] of all units in target army. (authority-based)
Reduces [[col:green]]movement range[[/col]] of an enemy army. (cunning-based)
[[col:green]]Reduces equipment bonuses[[/col]] for all units in the army.\n[[col:yellow]]Ineffective where units have no equipment bonuses.[[/col]]
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by manipulating somebody close to them.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character by tainting their food or drink.
[[col:green]]Kills the target[[/col]] character face to face.
Steals [[col:green]]food[[/col]] from the local region, adding it to your reserves and possibly causing starvation in enemy lands. (zeal-based)
Reveals [[col:green]] as-yet undiscovered armies, settlements and/or agents[[/col]] belonging to the target army's faction. (authority-based)
Steals food from target settlement, selling it for a profit and potentially causing attrition.
Causes [[col:green]]major damage[[/col]] to a single building in the target settlement.
Allows [[col:green]]covert movement[[/col]] about the campaign map, unseen unless spotted by keen-eyed rivals.
